bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.description:
In v0.11.0 pai-prod-1 bed, verifying to be released 0.11, found this regression. In Previous versions, we have Retry column: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55064971-ec94fb00-50b5-11e9-8ed2-60b65b2bf67f.png></denchmark-link>
In current build, the retry column is missing: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55065019-03d3e880-50b6-11e9-8959-666ab6943957.png></denchmark-link>
